channel.title: Elixir-Circuits on Embedded Elixir
channel.description: Recent content in Elixir-Circuits on Embedded Elixir

item.title: Talking I2C
item.description: Reading datasheets for fun and profit, or how I learned to stop worrying and convert analog signals into elixir terms.

item.title: Nerves At Home: Controlling a Desk
item.description: Use Nerves and a little reverse engineering to control a motorized desk. Then intercept current height messages from the controller and publish to a Phoenix site for real-time desk height measurements…because #yolo.
